headline.main: Florida Coach Gallant Gets Contract Extension
headline.print_headline: Florida Coach Gallant Gets Contract Extension

docs.snippet: The Florida Panthers extended coach Gerard Gallant's contract for a further two years on Friday as the franchise goes through one of their best periods in the NHL....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Florida Panthers extended coach Gerard Gallant's contract for a further two years on Friday as the franchise goes through one of their best periods in the NHL.

headline.main: Japan's Emperor Wishes for Peace in New Year's Appearance
headline.print_headline: Japan's Emperor Wishes for Peace in New Year's Appearance

docs.snippet: Japan's Emperor Akihito expressed his hopes for world peace as he appeared Saturday with his wife, Empress Michiko, sons and grandchildren behind bullet-proof glass before thousands of well-wishers waving flags....
docs.lead_paragraph: Japan's Emperor Akihito expressed his hopes for world peace as he appeared Saturday with his wife, Empress Michiko, sons and grandchildren behind bullet-proof glass before thousands of well-wishers waving flags.

headline.main: Butler Helps Bulls Pull Away From Knicks for 108-81 Victory
headline.print_headline: Butler Helps Bulls Pull Away From Knicks for 108-81 Victory

docs.snippet: Bobby Portis talks to himself in the third person when he gets on the court, saying stuff like "Come on, B.P." to get fired up. The rookie forward can shoot it from deep or score inside. And he is making quite an impression on the rest of the Chic...
docs.lead_paragraph: Bobby Portis talks to himself in the third person when he gets on the court, saying stuff like "Come on, B.P." to get fired up. The rookie forward can shoot it from deep or score inside. And he is making quite an impression on the rest of the Chicago Bulls.

headline.main: 4 Shot Dead Including Man, Wife in Suburban Los Angeles Home
headline.print_headline: 4 Shot Dead Including Man, Wife in Suburban Los Angeles Home

docs.snippet: A man shot and killed his wife and two others in his home on New Year's Eve before his son wrestled the gun away and fatally shot him in a chain of events apparently set off by a dispute over a washing machine, authorities said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man shot and killed his wife and two others in his home on New Year's Eve before his son wrestled the gun away and fatally shot him in a chain of events apparently set off by a dispute over a washing machine, authorities said.

docs.snippet: DeMar DeRozan had 23 points and Kyle Lowry added 18 points and 11 assists as the Toronto Raptors rallied to beat the Charlotte Hornets 104-94 Friday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: DeMar DeRozan had 23 points and Kyle Lowry added 18 points and 11 assists as the Toronto Raptors rallied to beat the Charlotte Hornets 104-94 Friday night.

headline.main: Australia Skipper Smith Plots Return to Test Summit
headline.print_headline: Australia Skipper Smith Plots Return to Test Summit

docs.snippet: After picking up pretty much every individual honour on offer in a spectacular 2015, Australia captain Steve Smith has a more collective goal in his sights this year -- restoring his country to the top of the test rankings....
docs.lead_paragraph: After picking up pretty much every individual honour on offer in a spectacular 2015, Australia captain Steve Smith has a more collective goal in his sights this year -- restoring his country to the top of the test rankings.

headline.main: Searchers Find Body of Seattle Philanthropist
headline.print_headline: Searchers Find Body of Seattle Philanthropist

docs.snippet: Search and rescue officials near Seattle found the body of a snowshoer on Friday who was identified as a locally well-known philanthropic leader and software entrepreneur....
docs.lead_paragraph: Search and rescue officials near Seattle found the body of a snowshoer on Friday who was identified as a locally well-known philanthropic leader and software entrepreneur.

headline.print_headline: Whiteside Scores 25, Heat Roll Past Mavericks 106-82
